p: Moreover, we have shown that the biofilm formation of Candida species was inhibited by the EO of Mentha piperita at a concentration of up to 2 Î¼l/ml [ 40 ]. In this study, AW inhibited the formation of Candida biofilm by about 50% at a concentration of 0.062 V/V. Concerning the very low concentrations of active compounds (i.e., %EO) in the AW, we can conclude that the AW has a high potential to inhibit the formation of biofilm.
